text: Ashurst LLP is a multinational law firm headquartered in London, United Kingdom. Ashurst is the UK's 11th largest law firm by revenue, according to the latest Legal 100 table by Legal Business.http://www.ashurst.com/about- ashurst.aspx?id_Content=66 Ashurst and Blake Dawson announce merger It has 25 offices in 15 countries across Asia, Australia, Europe, the Middle East and North America and employs around 1,600 legal advisers. Its principal business focus is mergers and acquisitions, corporate and structured finance. The firm also practices in other areas including investment funds, antitrust, energy, transport and infrastructure, intellectual property, IT, dispute resolution, financial services, tax, real estate, regulatory, telecommunication and employment. == References == == Other websites == *Ashurst website * Profiles in the Chambers Student Guide, and on Category:1822 establishments in Europe Category:Law firms of the United Kingdom
title: Ashurst LLP
